Java

Deep dive into Java fundamentals, concurrency, JVM internals, design patterns, Spring Framework, and performance optimization.

Topics

  1. Java Fundamentals - Core concepts, OOP, data types, and language features
  2. Java Concurrency - Threads, executors, synchronization, and concurrent collections
  3. JVM Internals - Memory model, garbage collection, and JIT compilation
  4. Java Design Patterns - Gang of Four patterns in Java
  5. Spring Framework - Core, Boot, MVC, and ecosystem
  6. Java Performance Optimization - Profiling, tuning, and best practices
  7. Java Best Practices - Code quality, testing, and maintainability
  8. Java Collections Framework - Lists, sets, maps, and algorithms
  9. Java Streams & Functional - Lambdas, streams, and functional programming
  10. Java Exception Handling - Error handling patterns and best practices
  11. Java Memory Model - Happens-before, visibility, and memory semantics
  12. Spring Security - Authentication, authorization, and security patterns
  13. Spring Data JPA - ORM, repositories, and database access
